function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spatial clustering of variables may indicate localized hotspots of disease transmission or contagion spread.","Impact":"Failure to identify and address spatial clusters could result in uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases within specific areas.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions and monitoring in spatial clusters to contain and mitigate the spread of contagious diseases. Use spatial analysis and geospatial technologies to identify and track clusters.","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, geographic information systems (GIS), remote sensing, spatial statistics, and location-based data technologies.","People":"Populations residing within spatial clusters or hotspots, and those at risk of contracting contagious diseases within these areas.","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies, and local government authorities."}]}
